meanings.sent1: She visits her grandmother oftenest on Sundays.
meanings.sent2: He reads books oftenest in the library.
meanings.sent3: The cat meows oftenest when it wants food.
meanings.sent4: The sun shines oftenest in the summer months.
meanings.sent5: The teacher smiles oftenest when her students do well.

meanings.definition: More frequently than any other time or occasion
meanings.sent1: They go for walks in the park oftenest during the evenings.
meanings.sent2: I check my email oftenest in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock rings oftenest on weekdays.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloom oftenest after a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirp oftenest at dawn.
